thread.title: Trump Superfan: 'I'm Hispanic ... We Vote For Mr. Trump'
thread.title_full: Trump Superfan: 'I'm Hispanic ... We Vote For Mr. Trump'

author: Lyzza
title: Trump Superfan: 'I'm Hispanic ... We Vote For Mr. Trump'
text: Quote: Originally Posted by caconservative "Hmm, sure, truly spontaneous act. Yeah right. Campaigns and their staff never have any clue that something like this might just happen at the right time. Whatever. Notice how often, and where, Trump touches this woman in front of everybody. What was it, 3 kisses? Yuck". You didn't post that? Are you serious? Check it out, you should be able to figure that out on your own. Or I would hope. Do you think I just pulled those words out of thin air? Made it up? What? Nope, I got that information from the article I linked in the OP. Reading can be hard for some, I get it. But at least try to read the article before you begin harassing me with snide comments. Because, if you do read the article, it might spark some discussion between us. Rather than this pathetic back and forth you seem to prefer.
